courses.title: AI Jailbreaking Ethics
courses.description: Understand the ethical framework behind AI jailbreaking. Learn responsible disclosure and the importance of security research.

courses.title: Prompt Engineering Fundamentals
courses.description: Master the art of crafting effective prompts for AI systems. Learn techniques to get better responses and understand AI behavior.

courses.title: Prompt Injection Techniques
courses.description: Learn about common prompt injection vulnerabilities and how to test AI systems for security flaws.

courses.title: AI Security Testing
courses.description: Advanced techniques for comprehensive AI security assessments. Red team methodologies and real-world testing scenarios.
